meanings.definition: A project or proposal that is in opposition to another project.
meanings.sent1: The students presented a counterproject to build a park instead of a shopping mall.
meanings.sent2: The city council approved the counterproject to preserve the historic building.
meanings.sent3: The counterproject to paint the school pink made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her idea to start a community garden was a counterproject to the plan for a new parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The counterproject to create a wildlife sanctuary was met with enthusiasm by the community.

meanings.definition: To propose a project in response to another project.
meanings.sent1: She decided to counterproject by suggesting a different approach to the problem.
meanings.sent2: The team will counterproject with a more cost-effective solution.
meanings.sent3: He likes to counterproject whenever his friends come up with new game ideas.
meanings.sent4: The company will counterproject by launching a new advertising campaign.
meanings.sent5: It is important to counterproject with innovative ideas to stay competitive in the market.
